preRollItemMacro.name: Item Macro "pre" Event
preRollItemMacro.hint: Requires Item Macro module. Execute Item Macro on an Item before it is rolled, passing the "pre" event.

postRollItemMacro.name: Item Macro "post" Event
postRollItemMacro.hint: Requires Item Macro module. Execute Item Macro on an Item after it is rolled, passing the "post" event. If you enable both this and the Item Macro "pre" event, be sure to check the event (args[0]) in your Item macros to avoid executing them twice.
